data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

The sentence "Take 1 step left" can be taken in 3 ways: First one is to face left, then right, third, and last. The sentence "Take 4 steps forward" can only be taken in 3 ways: First one is to face left, then right, third, and last. If you follow these instructions correctly, you can always take a single step forward as opposed to multiple steps forward when doing things the others way. So, the answer is Yes.
